article_title: Diary Of A Legislative Extortionist-Ted Cruz Goes Nuclear Against His Own Party To Save His Own Skin

article_metadata.description: (Image credit: Getty Images via @daylife) After months of attempting to tie the continued funding of the government to his demand that the Affordable Care Act be demolished, Texas Senator Ted Cruz is now coming face to face with what happens to demagogues who write political checks they can never [...]
